S.FORM: ngaluh, ngaloh . kagak kakuniza subal :真核域 Eukaryota salaedan :植物界 Plantae panan :木蘭植物門 Magnoliophyta upiz :木蘭綱 Magnoliopsida mata :唇形目 Lamiales sapamat :爵床科 Acanthaceae mikitinay :盧利草屬 Ruellia hicahicaay :塊根蘆莉草 R. tuberosa u siwkay nu nipaluma u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu, saungay misapayu' a cidekay u sulit nu zuma a kamu-Hulam atu Amilika Ruellia tuberosa, also known as minnieroot, fever root, snapdragon root and sheep potato , is a species of flowering plant in the Acanthaceae family. Its native range is in Central America but presently it has become naturalized in many countries of tropical South and Southeast Asia. Some butterfly species, like the lemon pansy (Junonia lemonias) and the mangrove buckeye (Junonia genoveva), feed on the leaves of Ruellia tuberosa.

ngaloh, ngaloh . kagak kakoniza sobal :真核域 Eokaryota salaedan :植物界 Plantae panan :木蘭植物門 Magnoliophyta opiz :木蘭綱 Magnoliopsida mata :唇形目 Lamiales sapamat :爵床科 Acanthaceae mikitinay :盧利草屬 Roellia hicahicaay :塊根蘆莉草 R. toberosa o siwkay no nipaloma o sanek no nipaloma malaheci to imelang pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o zoma a cidekay a kamo, saongay misapayo' a cidekay o solit no zoma a kamo-Holam ato Amilika Roellia toberosa, also known as minnieroot, fever root, snapdragon root and sheep potato , is a species of flowering plant in the Acanthaceae family. Its native range is in Central America bot presently it has become natoralized in many coontries of tropical Sooth and Sootheast Asia. Some botterfly species, like the lemon pansy (Jononia lemonias) and the mangrove bockeye (Jononia genoveva), feed on the leaves of Roellia toberosa.
